name: One Clone Left
description:
Fancy an army of extra lives? Just keep cloning yourself while holding the most powerful weapon you can find.
To survive you will have to frag every mutant zombie in sight... including the occasional bandit that gets in your way.
Level up and pick the best perks to boost your combat and cloning abilities.
Prop up a weapon to turn it into a sentry gun that automatically scans for targets.
A well placed grenade will take out the zombies feasting on your clones.
The noise and mayhem will attract bandits and government troops to the party.
Bandits survive by looting and the government... let's just say they can always use another cloning device.
So if you like games where the ground turns crimson and messy with bits and pieces of zombie then this is the game for you!
As a bonus we will let you play the maps in any order and reward you with permanent perks when you complete them.

One Clone Left Features:
Single or multiplayer via LAN
Co-op (up to 4 players) or death match (up to 6 players)
Clone yourself to create an army of extra lives
A wide variety of weapons with secondary functions
Enemy waves increase in difficulty
Survive caught between warring enemy factions
Destructible environments
Leveling system with randomized perks to choose from
Finishing a map rewards you with a permanent perk
Randomized and varied map layouts
Maps feature scripted random events and enemies
NPC allies will fight for you and provide you with quests
Game difficulty adjusts for the number of players in the map
Day and night cycles and lots of blood and gore!
